mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS id, a.type, a.tdate AS startime, a.comment, b.register, b.repairman, b.tdate, b.result, b.explain, c.name, c.location, c.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber, d.client_code AS code, g.name AS cname FROM b_client_fault AS a LEFT JOIN b_client_repair AS b ON a.id = b.b_client_fault_id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 AS c ON a.c_client_id = c.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client AS d ON c.c_client_id = d.id LEFT JOIN c_client_term AS f ON a.c_client_id = f.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_term AS g ON f.c_term_id = g.id
WHERE 1=1
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}), '%')
AND c.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}), '%')
AND d.client_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}), '%')
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.cname}), '%')
AND a.tdate > #{pd.Start}
AND a.tdate < #{pd.End}

mapper.update: UPDATE b_client_repair AS a SET a.register =#{register}, a.repairman =#{repairman}, a.tdate =#{tdate}, a.result =#{result}, a.explain =#{explain} WHERE a.b_client_fault_id =#{id}
